allow: Bash(python -c "import sys; sys.path.insert\(0, ''src''\); from vla import SpeechProcessor, CommandInterpreter, ActionExecutor; print\(''All VLA modules imported successfully''\)")

Bash(python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''src''\)

# Test imports
from vla import SpeechProcessor, CommandInterpreter, ActionExecutor, IntegratedCognitivePlanner
print\(''All modules imported successfully''\)

# Test CommandInterpreter
ci = CommandInterpreter\(\)
result = ci.interpret\(''Move forward 1 meter''\)
print\(''Command interpretation works:'', result is not None\)

# Test ActionExecutor
ae = ActionExecutor\(\)
status = ae.get_execution_status\(\)
print\(''Action executor works:'', status[''execution_status'']\)

# Test basic functionality
test_commands = [''Go to kitchen'', ''Pick up cup'', ''Turn left'']
for cmd in test_commands:
    result = ci.interpret\(cmd\)
    print\(''  Command ""{}"" -> {}''.format\(cmd, result[''action_type''] if result else ''None''\)\)

print\(''All VLA system components working correctly''\)
")
